compatibility.notes: The BSD-Inferno-Nettverk license is permissive and allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses such as GPL and AGPL.

key_requirements: Retain the copyright notice and conditions in redistributions.
Acknowledge the author in advertising materials.
Obtain permission for using the author's name for endorsements.

Include the list of conditions and disclaimer in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
